com.kinvey.persistence.query
Interface Query

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleQuery
public interface Query

Builder interface for creating a Kinvey data query.

Method Summary
 void addCriteria(String property, String op, Object value)
          Criteria can been appended (logical AND) to the query object.
 void clear()
          Clears the internal state of this query builder.
 Map<String,String> getParams()
          Returns the extra parameters of this query, eventually used to construct a valid http query to the server.

          Equivalent of the $near operand

          Equivalent of the $nearSphere operand

          Forces the server to order the results returned to teh client in ascending order.
 void orderByDescending(String fieldName)
          Forces the server to order the results returned to the client in descending order.

          Forces the server to limit the number of results returned by the query.

          Forces the server to skip the number of results returned by the query.

          Equivalent to a $within operand, based on a bounding box using represented by two corners

          Equivalent of the $within operand, used for geospatial operation

          Equivalent of the $centerSphere operand mostly intended for queries up to a few hundred miles or km.
 void withinPolygon(String property, List<Double[]> points)
          Equivalent to a $within operand, based on a bounding polygon represented by an array of points
 

Method Detail

addCriteria

void addCriteria(String property,
                 String op,
                 Object value)
Criteria can been appended (logical AND) to the query object.

Parameters:
property - name of the field to apply the criteria
op - use QueryOperators to pass the operation to apply in this criteria
value - the right hand side of the operation

setSkip

void setSkip(int num)
Forces the server to skip the number of results returned by the query.

Parameters:
num - the number of results that will be skipped.

setLimit

void setLimit(int num)
Forces the server to limit the number of results returned by the query.

Parameters:
num - the maximum number of results returned by the query.

orderByAscending

void orderByAscending(String fieldName)
Forces the server to order the results returned to teh client in ascending order.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of the field for which to order the results of query

orderByDescending

void orderByDescending(String fieldName)
Forces the server to order the results returned to the client in descending order.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of the field for which to order the results of the query

withinCenter

void withinCenter(String property,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double radius)
Equivalent of the $within operand, used for geospatial operation

Parameters:
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate
radius - radius

near

void near(String property,
          double x,
          double y)
Equivalent of the $near operand

Parameters:
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate

near

void near(String property,
          double x,
          double y,
          double maxDistance)
Equivalent of the $near operand

Parameters:
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate
maxDistance - max distance

nearSphere

void nearSphere(String property,
                double latitude,
                double longitude)
Equivalent of the $nearSphere operand

Parameters:
longitude - coordinate in decimal degrees
latitude - coordinate in decimal degrees

nearSphere

void nearSphere(String property,
                double latitude,
                double longitude,
                double maxDistance)
Equivalent of the $nearSphere operand

Parameters:
longitude - coordinate in decimal degrees
latitude - coordinate in decimal degrees
maxDistance - max spherical distance

withinCenterSphere

void withinCenterSphere(String property,
                        double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        double maxDistance)
Equivalent of the $centerSphere operand mostly intended for queries up to a few hundred miles or km.

Parameters:
longitude - coordinate in decimal degrees
latitude - coordinate in decimal degrees
maxDistance - max spherical distance

withinBox

void withinBox(String property,
               double x,
               double y,
               double x2,
               double y2)
Equivalent to a $within operand, based on a bounding box using represented by two corners

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate of the first box corner.
y - the y coordinate of the first box corner.
x2 - the x coordinate of the second box corner.
y2 - the y coordinate of the second box corner.

withinPolygon

void withinPolygon(String property,
                   List<Double[]> points)
Equivalent to a $within operand, based on a bounding polygon represented by an array of points

Parameters:
points - an array of Double[] defining the vertices of the search area

clear

void clear()
Clears the internal state of this query builder.

getParams

Map<String,String> getParams()
Returns the extra parameters of this query, eventually used to construct a valid http query to the server.

Returns:
a map of query params to values
